title: Mafia Nights
overview: Mafia Nights is an Iranian television series in the family, social and enigmatic genres, directed by Saeid Aboutaleb. This series is based on the Mafia game. In each season of this series, one of the film and television actors invites 12 of his friends to play Mafia, and they, together with Mohammad Reza Alimardani, who is called the leader or organizer of the game, make the game completely real without the intervention of the directing team. They do. It started broadcasting on Tuesday, November 18, 2020 on the home theater network and will be distributed weekly on Tuesdays.Â
